virality_potential.justification: Compares blockchain platforms with factual arguments, likely resonating within crypto communities but lacking broad emotional appeal.

duration_of_impact.justification: Ongoing blockchain debates could keep this relevant for weeks.

duration_of_impact.justification: Chain migrations can remain relevant for weeks if followed by developments.
